item.title: Chat as Primary Interface; And Why It's Not Enough
item.description:
Millennials and the Magic Wand

Sam Altman, the YC guy? Before there was OpenAI, there was Loopt, before there were LLMs, there was ML, and before there was chat, there was the magic wand.

2010s were a vibe, money was free and the jeans were skinny. The magic wand in a way accurately captures the mood of the decade. You’d digitize a niche, sprinkle a Bayes classifier, slap the wand label and raise a million dollar seed in the name of ML. Quick and lazy, and it worked until it didn’t.
